column2: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Collect the Sunspear relics from Crystal Oasis.
Master your bond with Aurene so that you can safely collect Volatile Magic.
The Monthly PvP Tournament is Saturday, July 22nd at 12PM CST. To celebrate, we've increased PvP reward track progress for the week!
You must have the ground targeted to use that skill.
Place the griffon eggs in their respective nests.

Use Swoop to dive toward the ground and engage foes below you, or enter the diving state by using movement ability 1. When you gain substantial diving speed, use movement ability 2 or the backward-movement key binds to carry your momentum upward.
Aurene has gifted you the ability to harvest Volatile Magic, which would otherwise be hazardous to touch.
The jackal's movement ability now lets you evade all incoming attacks. Press jump or mount ability 1 to activate the ability.
<c=@abilitytype>Signet.</c> You and your pet take no damage from attacks. You and your pet are still susceptible to conditions and control effects.
